snippet.title: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous Kickstarter Campaign
snippet.description:
Are you ready to travel into the Worldwound and fight the demonic hordes? What price are you willing to pay for power?
 
In this video, we reveal new information about our next game, Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous. Listen to Oleg Shpilchevsky, Alexander Mishulin, Nika Alborti, and Chris Avellone talk about WotR’s new features and design philosophy. Watch first gameplay footage highlighting the game’s visual effects, spells of new mythics, battles, and sieges.

Support us on Kickstarter to make this game even greater: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/owlcatgames/pathfinder-wrath-of-the-righteous

________________________________________________________________
Follow our official media to stay up-to-date with any and all news:
Official site: https://owlcatgames.com
Twitter: https://twitter.com/owlcatgames
Discord: https://discord.gg/syqGPZH

#Pathfinder #Kickstarter #OwlcatGames #WrathOfTheRighteous
